content.detailedDescription: I have seen 4 orbs/lights in formation in the sky at the intersection of mont���e st-fran���ois and levesque e boul when i waited the bus. i then thought it might be a ufo that traveling in a straight line and i heard no sound that came from the object and from the sky at the moment of the sighting except the sound of some cars that passed. i had no specific feeling. after a moment, i lost the object.
content.summary: Diamond-shaped ufo

content.detailedDescription: Summer night in 1977, i was 16 years old and was dropped off at home at approx. 11:30 pm by girlfriend. went inside to fix a sandwich and went to bedroom at about 12:00 midnight. sat on bed and was drawn attention to a purple very bright light shining through the blinds and into my room. i got up and pulled the blinds open and saw a purple oval shaped object that looked like liquid metal flowing around the craft. it was hovering above the road and house across the street about 20 to 25 feet in the air i watched for a few seconds, got scared and went to wake up my sister and brother-in-law whom i was living with at the time. i was freaking out and by the time they got to my room and looked out the window, the object was gone! till this day no one believed me but i know what i saw! i will take it to my grave. i was wondering if anyone else saw this thing also. this happened in chesterfield county virginia 1977 over tammaway drive in the clarendon subdivision. after all these years, i decided to report this thing because it really bugs me about what this was! really need to know if anyone else saw this too!
content.summary: Purple light throuh window looked out and saw object hovering over road and house across street' woke up others to look but was gone when returned.

content.detailedDescription: 15aprile2010: avvistato velivolo strano (ore 23.15 circa, arrivando da elmas (ca) e salendo sul ponte della pedemontana dalla ss130 dir iglesias) simile a un triangolo tre luci bianche fisse (nessuna luce tipo strobo, per segnalare presenza ali), una x lato; una luce rossa con lampeggio lento; era immobile per circa 5 o 10 minuti, la mia distanza dal velivolo era di circa 50/100 metri, nessun rumore emesso, poi ad un certo punto il velivolo, piega la punta anteriore verso il basso, la punta di sinistra pure essa verso il basso, ed io pensavo andasse a sinistra come ogni comune oggetto, ma no, questo oggetto con mia grande sorpresa e partito a destra, verso i monti di capoterra..Quindi si sposta verso sw dalla mia posizione...Nel frattempo un'elicottero sorvolava elmas e dintorni con grosso faro, velocit��� lenta. dopo tutto questo l'elicottero ��� andato verso elmas...
content.summary: Ufo triangolare stazionario

content.detailedDescription: Torking to my friend and he sees a object in the distons i look i seid that looks like a u.F.O?!
content.summary: Flashing visibal to invisibal

content.detailedDescription: O_o this happened near santa ysabel ave. on the central coast in atascadero, ca. so it flew heading north / north east over to my right side, flying over the roof tops and right over the top of the trees. it made a swish or swoosh sound like a hang glider, and it was very quiet, flying silently over the neighborhood. it was triangular with lights that seemed to blink slightly and some pulse. the size was about 10 + feet long and looked about 5 or more feet high. i'm reminded of a slightly greyish color , dark grey and lighter color almost white like a light grey on the bottom. the rest was black shades and it was hard to make out all of it in the dark. i knew when i saw it that it was a ufo, not say military or man-made. i had a strong, odd & weird feeling while watching it fly over. i have had prior ufo sitings and some after. so i take this stuff seriously. i have never observed a craft of that nature at night before, almost stealth like. sounds corney maybe, but i knew it was, say "not from here", so to speak.. o_o
content.summary: The triangular object flew over the street, over the rooftops and right over the tree tops in front of our home. while i was sitting on the roof of the garage, smoking a cig., the craft appeared from my left and flew over right accross in front of me..

content.detailedDescription: Can you please analysis photo to see if it a ufo or meteor i took picture with a galaxy express phone. thank you
content.summary: I saw object flying high among the passenger jets over the nyc it shined alitte bit sliver but mostly looked like a whit ball

content.detailedDescription:
I was able to look at the 4th with field glasses and then took 2 pics of it. they were at approximate elev of 2000 feet moving nne at approximately 150-200 mph. at an approximate distance of 1 mile, to our west. we saw the first 3 and watched them pass. with the 3 still in our view, the 4th came into view about 8 to 10 sec later. from the 3 to the 4th was a separation of approximately .5 miles. the lead 3 disappeared in an instance with the 4th following suit 30 sec or so later. the formation was similar to a military spearhead formation. lead / left and right flankers staggered back 5 to 10 sec and out about 300 ft. the rear guard trailing.

the color is very hard to explain, similar to the orange mixed with yellow flame of lp gas burner. the brightest white center slowly rotated from forward, direction of travel, to the right 90 deg, level with flight.

i did some research on the net. we saw the same objects as were seen in dearborn mi, in july 2013. 3 fire orange objects in a triangle with a 4th trailing. they looked exactly like those. the pics really blew my mind because when you zoom in they look different then with the naked eye.
content.summary: 4 orange/yellow orbs traveling sw to ne. 3 leading in a triangular formation with the 4th trailing.

content.detailedDescription:
Unknown globe-like object flying/drifting over our fairfax, virginia neighborhood 3/22/14 around 10:00pm. ufo was glowing within the globe but shadowed underneath, and appeared to turn and look at my wife and i at every window we would quickly jog to and analyze it from. lasted approx. 68-seconds. ufo moved cautiously yet eratically as it finally disappeared heading southeast toward springfield and the i495/i95 corridor.
unknown object somehow disallowed my smartphone's camera from booting up in an attempt to get footage...
content.summary: Unknown globe-like object flying/drifting over fairfax 3/22/14

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: i went on my balcony to smoke i saw bright flashing lights up in sky as it is a clear night. i watched for the duration of my cig then noticed a brief small4-6 quick movements. it then moved closer repidliyband i could see the triangular bottom. i then ran inside to report thi. which i'm doing for the second time. i got curious and went to look again i seen the object farther in the distance but as though a plane of some sort was circling it. i heard a helicopter close but could not see one. live next door to a hospital helicopters are common but thus one was quieter. i come back in and start typing this in much better detail the first time. then think i'm going to take pics. i hear the helicopters now circling they get distant then circle again. so i grab my sons ipad in fear at this point.  i start clicking away at the first and only object i had seen at the time. i look to my left in the lower sky there is an orange disc and it's looking like it's moving my direction. i quick hurry to take video but ipads said u- m fail or something. never did that before. but i click the button a few more times and run in the house bc that thing was moving closer.  i typed this so much better the first time so if you can look it up in your history you may find it. i don't know but i'm a little weirded out and here's the pics. funny thing is i didn't even see the other one and i had no clue what i was taking pictures of. analyze them please and prove me wrong. i would love to know how to get radar info right now and the helicopters i can still hear them.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright close revolving flashing light then approach

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving my house and heading east towards main ave and spied the object in the sky and thought it had an odd placement. i knew it was not a planet. when i reached main ave, i turned n and traveled about 1.5 miles but all the while i kept looking to see if the object was still there. i had at first thought it was possibly christmas lights left up from one of the mansions on the ridge as it was very dark out that night and the moon had not risen yet. when i reached about 1/2 s of mountain madness on 550 n i decided to pull over to try to take a photo or a video of the object with my iphone to try to figure out exactly what i was looking at.  at that point it was when i realized i was looking at a very large object hovering in the sky e of my location.  it was when i finally pulled over that i realized that it was not christmas lights as i had driven that same route numerous times over the previous weeks to pick my daughter up from a friends house and 1) there were no lights there before and 2)the object was much higher in the sky than any house could have reached.

the object looked like a horizontal oval and was a deep reddish orange color. i was very unsure what it possibly could have been, the object appeared to stay put.  i pulled over an attempted to take a couple of photos and videos but it didn't look like i was able to get anything.  i sat and watched the object for about 15 minutes. it appeared very large to me as it was a great distance away but was plainly visible to me.  

i felt very calm while seeing this and was not scared in any way.  i finally had to leave to get my daughter.  when driving back through the same path on our way home about an hour later, the object was gone.   

both images are extremely blown up, and due to how i was holding my camera, the videos are sideways, sorry.
content.summary: Oval shaped craft hovering in sky in the east over florida rd towards edgemont ranch

content.detailedDescription:
Please see my video tape! i live in pittsburgh pa and i am a war veteran from the iraq war. i was asleep last night on my comfortable chair when these things happened, when i am got up the next morning, the cross i was wearing was tied up around itself and the temperature in the house was turned up to 71 degrees!!!

i am a normal person, and that can be verified by the va here in pittsburgh, pa!

i was told by this creature by telepathy that i was left alone because of the cross and the fact i had was already wounded, (i had a stroke in 2008), but others would be taken.

these are these are the evens that unfolded:

     it was about 9:00 pm sunday night and i noticed as i was watching t.V. it was getting hot in the room and i fell asleep.   in what i thought was a dream, i was in a place that looked like my house in erie, pa that i grew up in, i came down the stars from what looked like a bedroom to a kitchen, and spoke to a person i knew, i then notice a huge black hole in the floor that came from out of no were.   i look down at the whole but for some reason i wasn���t afraid because this man came into the room and he was very pale and florescent, about 6��� and had black eyes. the man spoke to me and the other girl and said ���this is the prof we are here���, and then he said you can go back because you have gone through enough, but we will take many others���, he did not speak but was sending this telepathically. i realize this was no dream and i went back through the whole and back to my house.  

after this i couldn���t sleep for the rest of the night till 4:00 am after which i did wake up at 2:00 pm the next day. when i went down stars to eat breakfast, i realized that my cross around my neck was tied around itself, the cats had all disappeared and hide throughout the house, the temperature had been turned up to 71 degrees, and when i looked at the picture i tock last night after the incident, i looked bad! i also, felt drained and i thought this was friday not monday!   also, after what i thought was a dream i thought i was asleep for a lot longer than one hour!
the man i spoke to was 6' whit haired and had patch black eyes like a shark, and transparent skin.

today after this encounter i had to go to the bathroom constantly and my throwt was dried out and it felt like some one has put a tube done it.
content.summary: I was taken to a place inside a ship with a man who looked human.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: After a few of my friends and i played a gig at a nearby bar in cocoa beach, five of us including me walked to the beach. at first we were all talking and goofing around until we all laid down and began gazing the night sky. all of a sudden from the beach side three ships that could only be described as ships of light or fire flew above us in a v shape like ducks. the ships then seem to dance through each other in a braid-like formation as birds flying in the sky. they re-formed their v and instead of disappearing in the distance the ships simply vanished. after a short pause we all screamed, "wtf was that?!?!?" we wondered that since we were only about an hour form cape canaveral that nasa was experimenting with lights or so but there was no reflective light under or over the ships therefore these could not have been projected. but they moved so fast that there's no way they were of our technology. (that we know of) we also played with the idea of the myth of the phoenix, that we witnessed these birds playing above us. i can only depict what these ships looked like in my drawings. what's funny is when i showed them to my friends that were with me that night some of them remember seeing them a bit different. still, we all admit that we saw something that night that we'll most likely never witness again.
content.summary: 3 ships made of light or fire flew above us like birds then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was on my balcony watching the sky when i notice something unlike the others. every plane coming towards me or going away had two lights and the rest between them, and no stars were visible at this time because the sun was up. this light in the sky was quite low and it hovered for some time and pulsated quite a bit. it was a single light with no visible craft carrying it. i watched it for a few minutes until the light quickly turned as it dissipated. i think i saw something shoot off into the distance from where the light was, but i was too far and it was far too fast to know for sure.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Witnessed bright light hover over toronto then dissapear. no plane had head lights on

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a round object as i was driving down the round.Pulled over to take a picture but it disappeared. then i looked in the distance saw a cloud looking object that was moving downwards..Color was yellow orange and white like flames almost.  im not sure this is a ufo..It might be a comet but im not sure so i thought i would send it to mufon to see what it might be..
  the object moved downward real fast and disappeared never did know where it landed.
content.summary: Was parked thought say a round object in sky..It disappeared then i saw what looked like a glimpse of a cloud peaking through the sky..And it seemed to be on moving downwards like a plane..But it looked like a cloud moving fast.

content.detailedDescription:
Due to a medical condition i do not sleep through the night.  it was a very high moonligt night.

1 orb outside my window <10" at 2:30am moving horiz. at bottom of window back & forth.  briefly went to middle of 2nd window then back to previous with same motion.  after a min. or two another came to our bird feeder about 15' from window.

not sure if you care since no video/photo?  more detail if you care to contact.  just been bothering me since & only told 1 relative of my experience.  thought it might help with your research?
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 off white orb's in window/yard 1st 3-4min + 2nd 3-4min

content.detailedDescription: This is --------, i got abducted by greys in ca., i got it on video. i am downplaying what i know and shot on video. i need someone to help me with that video that can do final cut, i have inside shots of craft exam table (and a) grey holding (an) exam light on me. i am still angry at these creatures and confused. (i) don't like them, it's been almost three years and i've been sitting on this and (a) little scared. call me 1-***-***-****

content.detailedDescription: I was visiting the orlando area with family in the summer of 1992. i was a teenager.  we were staying in a hotel. it was after midnight. everyone was asleep inside, so i decided to sit out on the porch and enjoy the night sky. i was only outside for 10 or 15 minutes before i noticed what appeared to be a shooting star flying across the night sky...Among the stars. nothing new really, until it came to an abrupt stop and began moving in some sort of pattern. it abruptly changed directions a few times before it shot back through the night sky. the object looked like a star.  it was among the stars, or at least appeared to be.  except, this particular starlike object was maneuvering in ways that seemed to defy logic.  it happened very quickly and very "matter of fact". i was not awe struck or in wonderment, it just happened quickly, about 10-15 seconds and then it was gone. i remember, we had a video camera inside the hotel room, just feet away from where i was sitting. but, i decided to stay and watch, rather than running to get a camera and possibly missing the object. i've always felt the best way to describe seeing this was how it happened so "matter of factly".
content.summary: Appeared to be a shooting star, but the object stopped and changed directions abruptly before leaving eyesight.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking my dog along the shoreline in alameda, california by the bay farm island bridge. i noticed a blue bright reflection above the sun.

i took my cell phone, and started taking a total of ten photos in less than eight seconds. all photos are logged at 10:16am pst. the blue bright reflection object lower itself above the sun, and then it seemed to circle the sun.

this experienced has happened twice, today and once last week. i decided to send this information to mufon just in case it might be a ufo sighting, as i do not know if it is.

the original photos (no enhancements) are attached within this report are in the order in which they were taken. also, i have to say that i am only reporting one object, but with my own enhancements of my photos, in two of them it clearly shows two objects of which one does not look like the one i saw with my own eyes. i only can see this object when i changed a couple of the original photos with a bumpmapping filter, then added an x-ray filter; it is an unbelievable sight. and again, it just might be a a satellite or something else.

[(the photos that belong to this finally description are not included)-i have to also state that an experience that happened on may 26, 2013 at 11:44am showed four circular objects, as though each object was attached to one another. the only reason i took the pictures, a total of two, was because the cloud was not moving where all the clouds around this one cloud changed.]
content.summary: I saw an odd brightness above the sun which started to move around the sun very quickly, so i started to take photos.

content.detailedDescription:
It was morning march 16, 2014. i woke up to take care of the cats next door when the owner was on vacation. it was 6am and i remember seeing the clock as i walked out the door, 6:11. as i walked out on the porch to go next door, i noticed the moon was really prominent in the sky at the time. it wasn't bright or illuminated, just plain.
i thought my eyes were playing tricks on me because lights were coming off the moon and pulsating rapidly and then disappearing. there were enough for me to sort of shake my head and take a second look, completely aware, and i saw a solid light appear from/off the moon blink rapidly and ascended upward like the rest, and then disappeared. the all didn't go to the same area or come from the same place. think medusa's hair. then another much bigger light appeared descending from the bottom of the moon (or so it looked) - slowly and pulsating about a pulse/second and i lost it behind the horizon of trees and houses. i thought "okay, weird i saw something indescribable" and left it alone. however i thought it was strange when there was an earthquake about the same time the next day.
content.summary: Objects/lights coming off moon - blinking/pulsating. one large one descended slowly

content.detailedDescription:
I was the passenger in a friend���s car and we were heading through town in a nne direction at about 6:30pm m.S.T., there is a plateau on the edge of town which was directly in front of us about .5 miles away with a ridge which rises up behind it. directly ahead of us in the night sky i witnessed a bright white light in a stationary position. i thought it might be a plane (which is rare to have planes flying over town especially at night) and i knew it couldn't be a reflection from the sun as the full moon had just risen behind it.  i rolled the window down to get a better look at it and to see if i could hear any sound from it and right then we came to a stop light so i was able to point it out to my friend who was driving. we watched the light together for about 20 seconds and then it just disappeared.

i thought i might be able to distinguish some sort of a shape of the object because of the back lighting from the full moon, but the object was completely gone. there we no other aircraft in the sky that we could see.

we were both astonished at what we saw and then didn't see.
content.summary: Stationary light hovering over durango, then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
December 15, 2007 my 7 year old daughter and i left our house at 6:20pm heading down to a neighbors house for the evening, i was in the process of plugging our christmas lights in so there were no outside lights on. in our area the night sky is really dark and occasionally you can see satellites so i stopped to look to see if i was able to locate on to show my daughter.

i was standing in front of our house scanning the sky (which faces directly north) and i looked in a nne direction in the sky and i witnessed a bright white light slowly heading in a nnw direction. i watched the light for about 45 seconds to a minute when my daughter started to ask me if we could hurry up and go because it was cold out. i decided i wasn't going to point it out to her as i didn't know what i was looking at and i didn't want to scare her. as i watched the light move across the sky it faded to orange and gradually got smaller until it completely faded into the night sky and was no longer visible which took approximately 2 minutes. the light did not disappear behind the horizon, it just disappeared in the sky. 

when i first noticed the light i almost thought it was possibly the spotlight from a helicopter but there was no sound and because of the mountains in the canyon we live in, my thoughts were that by looking at the elevation of the light appeared to be much much higher than a helicopter would fly.

the light gradually disappeared while in transit, the best way i can think of to describe it is that it was much like when you turn a clear light bulb off and the filament is still hot and glows and as it cools of it goes completely out.
content.summary: Bright white light faded to orange / slowing moving across night sky until it disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my driveway watching the sky
object was bright at times 
i thought it was an unknown object
object was bright on and off giving off light and changing direction 
excited, as though i was seeing something not from here. grabbed camera and filmed it.
it was very high and the light kept going on and off. very hard to keep an eye on it. the nit faded out.
content.summary: Bright morphing changing direction

content.detailedDescription:
I was on driveway, in front of my house.
it looked like a bright star shine 
a bright star
bright white craft,it seemed to hover in one place, but i saw that it slowly was moving upward while i filmed it.
kept calm grabbed camera and filmed it. excited feeling and could tell it was not a normal object.
i lost sight as it got darker and object kept going upwards
i have much more film as i video taped it for 38 min
also when it got dark i could see a small white blinking under craft at times
content.summary: Ufo looked like bright disc, a star at first but was not

content.detailedDescription:
1. out in the front yard of our home aruund 9pm march 24th.

2. noticed something in the distance changing color and moving eratic.

3. at first thougt maybe a blimp, but it was moving to fast and eratic, maybe a chinese lantern, but there was no wind and the movement was not how a lantern would fly.

4.Orb that changed color orange, violet, blue, and red, went up and down left and right slowly

5. concerned and hoping to find a logical explanation

6. it moved down, below the homes in the distance, it cam back up a few more times and then never came back up.
content.summary: Cloudy night went out to enjoy the warm evening and sow something very unusual

content.detailedDescription: 24/02/2014...At seven o' clock in the mornig ,  i have photographed (from my car) with cellphone , the sky of my country... after i noticed this triangular object.
content.summary: Triangular object observed after having photographed the sky of my country

content.detailedDescription: I was in my bedroom writing my stories. i noticed a light outside my bedroom window. it was brighter than anything i had ever seen. i saw a bright light then another and then another. it was in the shape of a triangle. it descended from the night sky above the apartment building across from my bedroom window. it moved from left to right showing one light then all three. it was stationary for about 20-30 minutes moved back from left to right back to left went to the center above two trees and then shot up into the night sky with out any sound. honestly i didn't know what to think of it i just kept saying to myself " what the hell is that?!" i kept watching it with my eyes through my window blinds.I was really scared i didn't know what to think of it at all. it shot upwards into the night sky before the sun came up a few minutes before.
content.summary: A very bright three light triangle shape moving very slow and then fast.

content.detailedDescription:
Outside with my dog before bed.Beautiful night. clear sky. sitting on bricks facing north looking at big dipper and triangle group of stars to the west of dipper
 look up again and see a new star where one shouldn't be. look at dog then up and it is gone. keep staring and all of a sudden it is there again like a flash on a camera but longer. then gone. then appeared again maybe more east. sat awhile longer. saw one blimp then went in.
content.summary: Looking up at sky left of big dipper. see really bright star where one should not be. looked down then up and it was gone. weird. kept  looking. a few seconds it flashes again and is gone and then again. again

content.detailedDescription: I was driving from massachusetts on connecticut 189 to griffin place in windsor, ct (cigna and other corporations were my destination). i noticed in my left window (i was the driver) the black triangular ufo. when i first say the object, i thought it was a ufo. it remained essentially stationary throughout my encounter of the second type. i felt a calming sensation, sedative effect...As if there were nothing to worry about. i lost sight of the object because i continued to drive down the highway.
content.summary: Black triangle ufo by bradley international airport, highway connecticut 189 tariffville

content.detailedDescription:
Approximately 10:30 pm on march 22 in the rear yard of our house in hamilton city, ca. my wife and i observed a large green laser grid- like pattern pulsating and scanning over the back side of our house. we were both sitting in the back yard at the time this occurred star gazing.  i'm familiar with lasers and how they can be projected at objects at great distances but i had never seen anything like this before. the laser grid appeared to be 'scanning' the rear bedroom of our house that my 13 year old son was occupying. he ran out of his room to the back yard where my wife and i were to excitedly tell us that he saw a very bright green flashing light penetrate his window through closed blinds and light up his room abnormally. my wife and i were still in shock from what we saw from the outside. i jumped up on a patio chair to get a peak over the neighboring fence in search of an answer to our beam of light and found nothing. no cars no people. i'm a skeptic. so i ruled everything out. the way the laser like grid was projected on the house was definitely from above. but of course the sky was clear and very quiet, except for a low humming sound during the entire 6 seconds of the occurrence. i hope this is descriptive enough. i can give better details via phone conversation. as for the three of us that witnessed this phenomenon, we strongly feel that it was an extraterrestrial attempt of some sort of communication.
thank you
jf
content.summary: Green laser grid like pattern scanning motion over rear portion of our house.

content.detailedDescription:
i have evidence that all the nasa photos of mars are lies made in a studio and the arizona desert. we are told it is a dead planet, but the evidence i have shows that it not dead and has an advanced civilatoion. i have a photo of page from a 1955 edition of national geographic magazine which shows the planet from a telescope in s. africa.  the planet is half green and has blue clouds.  the page says that the green areas are vegetation.  this is really a 'smoking gun' proving that nasa has lied to us for fifty years about the planet. if you give me your address i can mail you a copy of this photo.
   other evidence can be found on line. look up the canals of mars, 1962 on google. since the 1890s photos of mars with lines on its surface which astronomers then called 'canals' by 1962 hundreds of clear photos of the canals were taken and published in the new york times and other publication that the us airforce made a map of them based on these photos which can be seen on line. three years later the first satellite took the first crude pictures of mars and nasa said it was a dead planet.  the famous astronomer, percival lowell, said it was evidence of an advanced civilization. the fix was in and the nyt ran an editorial denouncing anybody who believed that life existed on mars.
content.summary: Map of mars
